title: @SUMA_AlignToExperiment
description: Creates a version of Surface Anatomy that is registered to Experiment Anatomy.

exp_anat.title: Experiment Anatomy
exp_anat.description: Name of high resolution anatomical data set in register with experimental data.

surf_anat.title: Surface Anatomy
surf_anat.description: Path and name of high resolution antomical data set used to create the surface.

dxyz.title: Resolution for Downsampling
dxyz.description: Optional parameter to downsample anatomical volumes to dxyz mm voxel resolution before registration.

out_dxyz.title: Output Voxel Size
out_dxyz.description: Output the final aligned volume at a cubic voxelsize of DXYZmm.

wd.title: Use 3dWarpDrive
wd.description: Use 3dWarpDrive's general affine transform (12 param) instead of 3dvolreg's 6 parameters.

al.title: Use 3dAllineate
al.description: Use 3dAllineate to do the 12 parameter alignment. Cost function is 'lpa'.

al_opt.title: Options for 3dAllineate
al_opt.description: Specify set of options to pass to 3dAllineate.

ok_change_view.title: OK Change View
ok_change_view.description: Be quiet when view of registered volume is changed to match that of the Experiment_Anatomy.

align_centers.title: Align Centers
align_centers.description: Add an additional transformation to align the volume centers.

init_xform.title: Initial Transform
init_xform.description: Apply affine transform file to Surface_Anatomy before beginning registration.

EA_clip_below.title: Clip Below
EA_clip_below.description: Set slices below CLPmm in 'Experiment Anatomy' to zero.

surf_anat_followers.title: Surface Anatomy Followers
surf_anat_followers.description: Apply the same alignment transform to additional datasets.

followers_interp.title: Interpolation Mode
followers_interp.description: Set the interpolation mode for the follower datasets.

atlas_followers.title: Atlas Followers
atlas_followers.description: Automatically set the followers to be atlases in the directory of -surf_anat.

echo.title: Echo Commands
echo.description: Echo all commands to terminal for debugging.
